            "title": [
              [
                "It’s possible to extent native elements, but their descendants don’t get to have their own tag names. Instead, the "
              ],
              [
                "is",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " attribute is used to specify which subclass an element is supposed to use. For example, here’s an extension of the "
              ],
              [
                "\u003cimg\u003e",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                " element which logs a message to the console when it’s loaded."
              ]
            ]
          },
